Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 At the moment this question was asked to megatron where his loyalties lie a 
typed message would appear infront of his eyes. Only he would recieve it. It 
would read. "Hello brother. It has been a long time. You have done well since 
my unfortunate departure. I shall return soon. When I am made whole again we 
shall reign terror on all our enemies. And these decepticons are one of them. 
Dont trust them as you would trust your worst enemy. If you join them dont 
turn your back. I shall see you soon brother for we are forever linked." The 
message ended and Megs full visual would return. The dark sparked pulsed with 
anticipation.

--part1_35.191eacb6.28a58cba_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
